p:
Embryos cultured in six-well cell culture plates (Falcon) were time-lapse imaged on an inverted wide-field microscope (Axiovert; Zeiss). Brightfield and fluorescent images were captured every 6 min for 20–24 h, using Axiovision software as described in ref.
64 . At the end of the incubation, most embryos had reached stage HH10-11.
